about_the_game:
In a misty forest, you play as a hungry zombie, you constantly run, must catch up with humans to fuel to survive, careful not to run into your own kind.
The forest is littered with gold coins, which can be collected for points to increase your maximum health.
Blue items like lightning symbols can increase your running speed for a short time.However, be aware that each time you use this item, you will lose a piece of body, and using too much will directly cause the game to fail.
The Red Cross item restores some of your health.
White clockwork shaped item can pause time around and stop nearby humans.
Pink lollipop shaped item can confuse surrounding humans and make them run back.
The green skull-shaped item allows you to turn into a ghost for a short time, ignoring the trees.
Enjoy the endless chase.

In a misty forest, you play as a hungry zombie, you constantly run, must catch up with humans to fuel to survive, careful not to run into your own kind.
The forest is littered with gold coins, which can be collected for points to increase your maximum health.
Blue items like lightning symbols can increase your running speed for a short time.However, be aware that each time you use this item, you will lose a piece of body, and using too much will directly cause the game to fail.
The Red Cross item restores some of your health.
White clockwork shaped item can pause time around and stop nearby humans.
Pink lollipop shaped item can confuse surrounding humans and make them run back.
The green skull-shaped item allows you to turn into a ghost for a short time, ignoring the trees.
Enjoy the endless chase.
name: Runombie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (ver. 2004 or later)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 / Intel® Core™ i5-3330
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 480 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / 3GB VRAM required
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (ver. 2004 or later)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 3100 / Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 / 8GB VRAM required
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
